description:
A Load Balancer Server Certificate is an ssl Certificate used by the listener of the protocol https.

For information about slb and how to use it, see [What is Server Load Balancer](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/27539.htm).

For information about Server Certificate and how to use it, see [Configure Server Certificate](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/85968.htm).

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

AlicloudCertificateId.description: an id of server certificate ssued/proxied by alibaba cloud. but it is not supported on the international site of alibaba cloud now.

AlicloudCertificateName.description: the name of the certificate specified by `alicloud_certificate_id`.but it is not supported on the international site of alibaba cloud now.

AlicloudCertificateRegionId.description: the region of the certificate specified by `alicloud_certificate_id`. but it is not supported on the international site of alibaba cloud now.

PrivateKey.description: the content of privat key of the ssl certificate specified by `server_certificate`. where `alicloud_certificate_id` is null, it is required, otherwise it is ignored.

ResourceGroupId.description: The Id of resource group which the slb server certificate belongs.

ServerCertificate.description: the content of the ssl certificate. where `alicloud_certificate_id` is null, it is required, otherwise it is ignored.

Tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.
